ygData.subject: Re: Is The Journey To LVL 23 Worth IT!!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are a Troll or Ogre you can bash even when wielding a 2H weapon, so then it would be stupid not to. If you are a dark elf work both up to be able to use
ygData.messageBody:
If you are a Troll or Ogre you can bash even when wielding a 2H weapon, so then
it would be stupid not to.
If you are a dark elf work both up to be able to use the best according to what
weapon you have aquired. If you are a humie... I feel sorry for you (joke, same
as for dark elf). =)

Jennocide

>
> Hello my fellow Shadow Knights,
>
> I am a Dark Elf, LVL 19, and i have a question for u LVL 22's and above. My
> question is, "Do we SK's become very powerful at LVL 22?" The reason that
> i ask this is because i've heard a few people say that if u hold on and keep
> playing and hit lvl 22 that u won't be disappointed. As of right now i
> basically am a weak warrior with a few weak spells. Do our spells improve
> greatly? I sure hope so, because from what i've been told SK's are one of
> the strongest high lvl classes there is... so let me know something u higher
> lvl players!!!
>
> One last question... Which is better using a 2H Slashing weapon our using a
> 1H Slashing Weapon with bash? Hehe, and don't tell me it depends on the
> weapon... my question is overall.... Just wondering because if 2H Slashing
> is better then I'll have to start lvling it up..
>
> Thanks Brothers,
>
> Arikor
